scenario_1.persona_content: A medical student who is interested in the anatomy and physiology of the human body, particularly the male reproductive system. They are curious about the development, growth, and function of the penis, and how it differs from other mammals. They are also interested in the anatomy of the human body, including the structure and function of the urinary tract, and the role of the penis in sexual intercourse and other forms of sexual activity.
scenario_1.thought: As a medical student, I am always looking for opportunities to learn and grow. In this scenario, I am Person B. The left option gives me 600 and Person A gets 0. The right option gives me 400 and Person A gets 400. Since I am more interested in maximizing my own outcome, I will choose the left option, where I get 600 and Person A gets 0. I value maximizing my resources.
